metadata.description: Name of the Log Analytics workspace
Full resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace

resources.name: Brute Force Success - Login After Mass Failures

properties.displayName: Brute Force Success - Login After Mass Failures
properties.description: Detects a successful sign-in from an IP address that previously generated more than 20 failed authentication attempts within 24 hours. Indicates a brute force attack that succeeded.

allOf.query:
let bruteForceIPs =
    SigninLogs
    | where ResultType != 0
    | summarize FailureCount = count() by IPAddress
    | where FailureCount > 20
    | project IPAddress;
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == 0
| where IPAddress in (bruteForceIPs)
| project TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, Location, AppDisplayName
